content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_ldw
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('silver.taxi_zone') IS NOT NULL
   DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.txi_zone
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.taxi_zone
      WITH 
      (
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_ldw,
        LOCATION = 'silver/taxi_zone',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
      )

AS 
  SELECT *
     FROM bronze.taxi_zone

--- 

SELECT TOP(10) * FROM silver.taxi_zone


     ----- create external table 

     IF OBJECT_ID('silver.trip_data_green_csv') IS NOT NULL
   DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.trip_data_green_csv
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.trip_data_green_csv
      WITH 
      (
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_ldw,
        LOCATION = 'silver/trip_data_green_csv',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
      )

AS 
  SELECT *
     FROM bronze.trip_data_green_csv


    --- select

    SELECT * FROM silver.trip_data_green_csv
